page.title: 15COUNTRY LIFE-CHRIS (RETIRED)
page.content: { Chris and Mary}live in a cottage approached across a field track off a country lane. From their garden they have extensive views beyond{Leamington right to the{Malvern Hills. There is no nearby Bus service so a car is essential especially as nearest shops are in{Leamington or Southam. Although they have retired, Chris and Mary lead busy lives. Chris is skilled in electrical and woodwork and is often requested to help the local farmer with problems. Mary enjoys creating fashionable knitwear for her daughter who is a beautician. Chris's hobby is wood carving. He has beautiful samples of his work around the house and is now starting to make a carved fire surround. { Both enjoy the country, and would {not like to change their way of life.
